item.description:
ALEX ALVEAR & M A N G O

B L U E
CD Release Party
Wednesday February 9, 8:00 pm
OBERON
2 Arrow Street (Corner of Arrow and Mass Ave)
Cambridge, MA 02138

GET TICKETS:
http://www.cluboberon.com/events/alex-alvear-and-mango-blue-album-release-concertparty

Tickets
$10 Admission
$15 Admission + CD

After the BIG SNOW we have a new date!! We're going to be filming this event so we need lots of happy people there. Please help us spread the word to your friends and networks. It's going to be an amazing evening with great performances by some really special guests as well as Mango Blue playing the music from our new CD.
item.why: If you are not familiar yet with their music you are in for a real treat and if do know Mango Blue you know that you cannot miss this event!
item.name: ALEX ALVEAR & M A N G O B L U E CD Release Party
